did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The Theda Gibson Papers is in regards to a librarian at the Wise County [Virginia] Lonesome Pine Regional Public Library who contacted several prominent American figures in her present era.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Theda Gibson Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Theda Gibson Papers, Ms1977-002, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Theda Gibson Papers were acquired prior to 1977.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Theda Gibson Papers was completed in 1977. Additional description was completed in March 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Theda Gibson was librarian at the Wise County [Virginia] Lonesome Pine Regional Public Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content note
scopecontent.p: Theda Gibson Papers include the correspondence of a librarian from Wise County, Virginia, to a American celebrities political figures. The collection contains photocopies of letters to Gibson, answering her query about favorite books. Some of the celebrities include Alan Alda, Melvin Belli, Jimmy Carter, Julia Child, Ann Landers, Norman Lear, Margaret Mead, Barbara Walters, O.J. Simpson, Cher, First lady Mrs. Ford, and Lawrence Welk.

arrangement.head: Arrangement note
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged chronologically, with two undated letters at the end.
